column5: Was thinking of picking up an Okuma Aveon spinning reel, felt good.  So I was wondering if anyone owns one and can comment on it?
Had one and returned it .  The reel prefromed  well at first but didn't hold up after a few large fish  were land using it .
Although it's not the same reel, just ask Gerritt or Bill Parker how much I like my Okuma line counter! It is poop! HH
Well by your standards it was huge .  Yea the pfluger trion is a sweet reel . Just ask Bly and CCMT that is what they use.

Thanks for the input all.  I already have 2 Pluegers, Trion and President.  Like the President, wasn't too keen on the drag on the Trion, plus a gear broke inside rendering it useless.  Still gotta contact Plflueger to try to get that part.
I own one and can't say I've had any problems with it. It been rattled around in boats and in the truck and has a few battle scars but is still smooth as the day it came out of the box.  L.
If it was bigger than that Yellow Perch I caught at the BOQ, it was huge!
